text: BACK GRID ; Instagram Candice Swanepoel beats back against the Body Shamers. The model ` ` Victoria's Secret'' only gave birth to her second boy, Ariel, 12 days ago, and she has already managed to go to the beach wearing a bikini. Frustrated by the negative comments that flooded her feed, Candice turned to Instagram Stories on Wednesday to appeal to the haters who criticized her body after the pregnancy.
